data.eml:eml: The genus Gelanes Horstmann (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae) from South Korea, with description of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Ki-Beom, Balueva, Ekaterina N., Khalaim, Andrei I., Lee, Jong-Wook (2013): The genus Gelanes Horstmann (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae) from South Korea, with description of four new species. Zootaxa 3716 (3): 417-430, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.3.5
